# SummitUI

> WCAG-compliant, fully customizable headless Blazor components.

SummitUI is a headless component library for Blazor that provides high-quality, accessible building blocks for your applications. It focuses on logic, accessibility, and performance across all Blazor render modes.

## Components

- [Accordion](https://www.summitui.com/docs/accordion/llms.txt)
- [AlertDialog](https://www.summitui.com/docs/alertdialog/llms.txt)
- [Calendar](https://www.summitui.com/docs/calendar/llms.txt)
- [Checkbox](https://www.summitui.com/docs/checkbox/llms.txt)
- [Combobox](https://www.summitui.com/docs/combobox/llms.txt)
- [DateField](https://www.summitui.com/docs/datefield/llms.txt)
- [Dialog](https://www.summitui.com/docs/dialog/llms.txt)
- [DropdownMenu](https://www.summitui.com/docs/dropdownmenu/llms.txt)
- [FocusTrap](https://www.summitui.com/docs/focustrap/llms.txt)
- [OTP Input](https://www.summitui.com/docs/otp/llms.txt)
- [Popover](https://www.summitui.com/docs/popover/llms.txt)
- [RadioGroup](https://www.summitui.com/docs/radiogroup/llms.txt)
- [Select](https://www.summitui.com/docs/select/llms.txt)
- [Switch](https://www.summitui.com/docs/switch/llms.txt)
- [Tabs](https://www.summitui.com/docs/tabs/llms.txt)

## Guides

- [DatePicker Composition](https://www.summitui.com/docs/guides/datepicker-composition/llms.txt)
- [Drawer Composition](https://www.summitui.com/docs/guides/drawer-composition/llms.txt)


## Getting Started

- [Installation](https://www.summitui.com/installation)

## Principles

- **Headless**: Logic and state management without opinionated styling.
- **Accessible**: Built-in WCAG compliance and ARIA attributes.
- **Performant**: Optimized for WASM, SSR, and Interactive Server modes.
- **Customizable**: Full control over markup and styling via data attributes.
